full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZI'I RLABS 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PAS, MCHOG DMAN 'GRON LA GTOR MA DANG, GSER SKYEMS BSANGS SOGS GTONG BA'I SKABS, ,'DOD GSOL MKHAS BSGYUR BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
